## RenderedConnection.targetBlock() method

Returns the block that this connection connects to.

**Signature:**

```typescript
targetBlock(): BlockSvg | null;
```
**Returns:**

[BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) \| null

The connected block or null if none is connected.
